Name: THE NEW CHRONICLES OF NOAH'S ARK
About the game: Help Noah in this Match3 game to build a great ark capable of housing two of each kind of animal, in order to save them and bring them safely through the flood. It will be a tremendous task, one that sounds impossible to complete. - The classic story of Noahâ€™s ark retold here in a new format! - Gather resources through challenging match-3 puzzles. - Build the ark across 20 upgrades and 5 chapters. - Enjoy this classic story given new life. - Fascinating graphics and music while playing the game.
